Row.Text: Each Library gets a [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Writing great work slot. +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Point for each Campus district with a Library building. +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing. Gain the Yunicopter unique unit with Electricity.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: Libraries and Universities provide [ICON_Production] Production equal to their intrinsic [ICON_Science] Science output.
Grants an extra leader trait for each Landosol leader.

Every unit gets a free Promotion when produced or upgraded. Campus district and Theater Square district's adjacency bonuses both provide [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. +1 [ICON_Science] Science and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture from improved Strategic resources.{LOC_TRAIT_FRIENDSHIP_CLUB_BONUS}

Yuni, the most talented student of the St. Theresa's Girl Academy, leave the ivory tower and start your exploration with knowledge you have learned. Together with your wisdom and companions, you will reveal truths of the world. Understand changes of everything, and lead your people to get rid of ignorance, so that history will remember your name and achievements.
Landosol unique building. +10% [ICON_Production] Production in this city, and provides unique bonuses for each Landsol leader (see each leader for details).

Landosol unique Modern era support unit when Yuni is their leader that replaces the Drone. Cheaper to produce, unlocked by Electricity, and adds +1 [ICON_Range] Range and +5 [ICON_Bombard] Bombard Strength to Siege class units within 1 hex.

Landosol unique Renaissance era siege unit that replaces the Bombard. Cannot move and attack on the same turn unless they've earned the Expert Crew promotion. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. land and naval units.
+10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and 5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in cities with a Campus district. If there are 5 Coast tiles within 3 tiles of a city and owned by you these yields are doubled.

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point.

Campuses are granted a Major adjacency with Rivers and a Standard adjacency from Coasts. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to all tiles adjacent to water with Writing. Ranged units receive +1 [ICON_Range] Range in land tiles adjacent to water.
{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION_SHARED} When the first Spaceport is constructed the Nanotechnology technology is unlocked.{LOC_TRAIT_LITTLE_LYRICAL_BONUS}
{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION_SHARED} When Launch Mars Colony is completed the Offworld Mission technology is unlocked.{LOC_TRAIT_LITTLE_LYRICAL_BONUS}

Kyoka, you have maturity needed for being a leader since your childhood. Your people are proud of you and see you as their model. You are diligent and wise, leading people to explore blue seas and skies with guide of starlight. Start grand adventures with your allies, and dig deep into the universe. But be cautious, as suspicious enemies are gazing upon your land.

Founding a Pantheon unlocks the Mysticism civic and provides +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points per turn. Charming or Breathtaking tiles adjacent to Mountains, Woods, or Natural Wonders receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Woods tiles grant additioanl +1 Appeal to adjacent tiles. Gain the Miko of Ameth unique unit with Divine Right.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: Farms in this city provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production to adjacent Farms.

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. Can plant Woods (second-growth) with Conservation. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. Can plant Woods (second-growth) without prerequisite civics. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Ameth has sent you a new oracle, little guide Kokkoro. Magnificent nature is your source of power, and you will protect your people and allies steadily with its help. If you can have strong conviction, your calls will be answered by your patron deity. Go forth with blessings of wind spirits, and surely you will be successful in every endeavour.
